name: chitchatter
tagline: A self-hosted peer-to-peer chat app running directly in the browser
description: Chitchatter is a self-hosted, peer-to-peer chat client that works directly in the browser without servers. It uses WebRTC for secure and decentralized communications and requires no login or signup.

features.title: Peer
features.description: Direct browser-to-browser communication. No servers needed

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Secure, encrypted connections using WebRTC. Private communication

features.title: No Registration
features.description: Start chatting without accounts or signup. Instant access

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: No central server stores your messages. True privacy

features.title: Browser
features.description: Works entirely in web browser. No installation

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Host your own signaling server. Complete control

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Transparent, auditable code. Trust through verification
